edu.chalmers.service

Class FederationResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.chalmers.service.AbstractResource
      • edu.chalmers.service.FederationResource

  • public class FederationResource
extends AbstractResource
    Handles the Federation part of the database and the connection to it. Also managed everything regarding members, such as promote and demote rank.
    Author:
    Mikael Stolpe
